description:
A survey of 19th-century American literature that usually focuses on a particular issue or problem, such as: gender and manhood; the politics of humor; representing the nation. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a complete description of the current offerings.
name: 19 CENTURY AMERICAN LIT: The 'Social Self' in US Literature 1880-1920

section.name: 19 CENTURY AMERICAN LIT: The 'Social Self' in US Literature 1880-1920

values.name: 19 CENTURY AMERICAN LIT: The 'Social Self' in US Literature 1880-1920
